source: ## Import Python Function, that are required for this script
from pyspark.sql.functions import to_timestamp, col, when, lit, round, min, max, substring, desc, count, sin, asin, cos, sqrt, pow, radians, date_format

# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

delivery = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicdelivery.parquet', format='parquet')
delivery.createOrReplaceTempView("delivery")

lhdelivery = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publiclhdelivery.parquet', format='parquet')
lhdelivery.createOrReplaceTempView("lhdelivery")

pod = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/Onroute/publicpod.parquet', format='parquet')
pod.createOrReplaceTempView("pod")

pod = spark.sql("""

SELECT MAX(id) as id, did, name, poddate, lat, lng, customerrating, customerfeedback, podappdate
FROM pod 
GROUP BY did, name, poddate, lat, lng, customerrating, customerfeedback, podappdate

""")
#pod.show()
pod.createOrReplaceTempView("pod")

T_Delivery = spark.sql(
    """
    select 
    delivery.did AS dispatch_id,
    delivery.id as delivery_id,
    delivery.did as delivery_dispatch_id,
    customerid as delivery_customerid,
    waybillid as delivery_waybillid,
    address as delivery_address,
    town as delivery_town,
    province as delivery_province,
    country as delivery_country,
    delivery.lat as delivery_lat,
    delivery.lng as delivery_lng,
    placeid as delivery_placeid,
    what3words as delivery_what3words,
    zipcode as delivery_zipcode,
    billingcustid as delivery_billingcustid,
    to_timestamp(eta) as delivery_eta,
    to_timestamp(actualeta) as delivery_actualeta,

    to_timestamp(deliverydate) as delivery_deliverydatetime, 
    to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(deliverydate), 'GMT-2')) AS delivery_deliverydate,
    date_format(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(deliverydate), 'GMT-2'), 'HH:mm:ss') AS delivery_deliverytime,

    to_timestamp(deliverby) as delivery_deliverbydatetime,
    to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(deliverby), 'GMT-2')) AS delivery_deliverbydate,
    date_format(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(deliverby), 'GMT-2'), 'HH:mm:ss') AS delivery_deliverbytime,

    deliveryorder as delivery_deliveryorder,
    to_timestamp(tsgeofenceenter) as delivery_tsgeofenceenter,
    to_timestamp(tsscanningstart) as delivery_tsscanningstart,
    to_timestamp(tsscanningstop) as delivery_tsscanningstop,
    to_timestamp(tspodsignature) as delivery_tspodsignature,    

    aid as delivery_aid,
    numprcls as delivery_numprcls,
    geocodingstatus as delivery_geocodingstatus,
    skipdate as delivery_skipdate,
    skipreason as delivery_skipreason,
    status as delivery_status,
    partialmatch as delivery_partialmatch,
    approximated as delivery_approximated,
    lmsorder as delivery_lmsorder,
    optimizedorder as delivery_optimizedorder,
    seal as delivery_seal,
    customerinvoice as delivery_customerinvoice,
    customerdn as delivery_customerdn,
    grv as delivery_grv,
    chepslip as delivery_chepslip,
    cleandelivery as delivery_cleandelivery,
    trackingcode as delivery_trackingcode,
    if(ISNULL(delivery.mode), 'deliver', delivery.mode) as delivery_mode,

    customorder as delivery_customorder,
    verified as delivery_verified,
    altered as delivery_altered,
    orderid as delivery_orderid,
    lastregioncrossed as delivery_lastregioncrossed,    
    mergeid as delivery_mergeid,
    orderref as delivery_orderref,
    drivernote as delivery_drivernote,
    timedefinite as delivery_timedefinite,
    orvcode as delivery_orvcode,
    vaid as delivery_vaid,
    delegatedate as delivery_delegatedate,
    delegatemode as delivery_delegatemode,
    debriefmode as delivery_debriefmode,
    debriefed as delivery_debriefed,
    insdate as delivery_insdate,
    reviseddebrief as delivery_reviseddebrief,
    lmsdebriefed as delivery_lmsdebriefed,
    uncanceldate as delivery_uncanceldate,
    podlaterdate as delivery_podlaterdate,
    podmanualdate as delivery_podmanualdate,
    manualdebriefreason as delivery_manualdebriefreason,
    submanualdebriefreason as delivery_submanualdebriefreason,
    outofgeofencereason as delivery_outofgeofencereason,
    tsentergeofenceapp as delivery_tsentergeofenceapp,
    tsexitgeofenceapp as delivery_tsexitgeofenceapp,
    comebacklater as delivery_comebacklater,
    uncancelusername as delivery_uncancelusername,
    '' as delivery_poddistancefromdeliverypoint,
    concat('[', coalesce(cast(delivery.lat as varchar(255)), ''), ',' , coalesce(cast(delivery.lng as varchar(255)), ''), ']') as delivery_geopoint,
    pod.lat as p_lat,
    delivery.lat as d_lat,
    pod.lng as p_lng,
    delivery.lng as d_lng

    from delivery LEFT JOIN pod on pod.did = delivery.id
"""
)

# reformat the time (not the timestamps) to the correct format
#T_Delivery = T_Delivery.withColumn("delivery_deliverytime", date_format('delivery_deliverytime', 'HH:mm:ss'))
#T_Delivery = T_Delivery.withColumn("delivery_deliverbytime", date_format('delivery_deliverbytime', 'HH:mm:ss'))


# add the calc fields
T_Delivery = T_Delivery.withColumn('delivery_poddistancefromdeliverypoint', 
    2 * 3961 * asin(sqrt(pow(sin(radians((col('p_lat') - col('d_lat')) / 2)), 2) + cos(radians(col('d_lat'))) * cos(radians(col('p_lat'))) * pow(sin(radians((col('p_lng') - col('d_lng') ) / 2)), 2)))*1.60934
    )

# remove the unncessary fields
T_Delivery = T_Delivery.drop(*('p_lat', 'd_lat', 'p_lng', 'd_lng'))

T_Delivery.createOrReplaceTempView("T_Delivery")

T_LHDelivery = spark.sql(
    """
    select 
        id,
        did,
        address,
        lat,
        lng,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(actualeta), 'GMT-2')) as actualeta,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(eta), 'GMT-2')) as eta,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsgeofenceenter), 'GMT-2') as tsgeofenceenter,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsdocuments), 'GMT-2') as tsdocuments,
        customerref1,
        customerref2,
        trailersize,
        cargoweight,
        cubicvolume,
        geocodingstatus,
        status,
        optimizedorder,
        triporder,
        sequence,
        bookingid,
        grv,
        chepslip,
        type,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(insdate), 'GMT-2')) as insdate,
        isdirect,
        notes,
        contactperson,
        contactnumber,
        trailerfleetcode,
        primarycustomerid,
        pcustomername,
        pcustomeraccountnumber,
        pcustomerrevenuecode,
        secondarycustomerid,
        scustomername,
        scustomeraccountnumber,
        scustomerrevenuecode,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(actiondate), 'GMT-2')) as actiondate,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsgeofenceexit), 'GMT-2') as tsgeofenceexit,
        pctmsid,
        sctmsid,
        customorder,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(skipdate), 'GMT-2')) as skipdate,
        skipreason,
        outofgeofencereason,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsarrivedcustomer), 'GMT-2') as tsarrivedcustomer,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsdroppedoff), 'GMT-2') as tsdroppedoff,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsstartoffloading), 'GMT-2') as tsstartoffloading,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsstartloading), 'GMT-2') as tsstartloading,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsloaded), 'GMT-2') as tsloaded,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsfinishedoffloading), 'GMT-2') as tsfinishedoffloading,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsdocumnetshanddovedriver), 'GMT-2') as tsdocumnetshanddovedriver,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsleavingcustomer), 'GMT-2') as tsleavingcustomer,
        actionsubtype,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsstart), 'GMT-2') as tsstart,
        signame,
        signcomment,
        to_date(to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(signdate), 'GMT-2')) as signdate,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsendtate), 'GMT-2') as tsendtate,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsentergeofenceapp), 'GMT-2') as tsentergeofenceapp,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tsexitgeofenceapp), 'GMT-2') as tsexitgeofenceapp,
        tmsid,
        subtype,
        needbotrailerver,
        secondtrailerfleetcode,
        trailerverlat,
        trailerverlng,
        to_utc_timestamp(to_timestamp(tstrailerver), 'GMT-2') as tstrailerver,
        podlat,
        podlng,
        skiplat,
        skiplng,
        uncanceldate,
        manifestsjson
    from lhdelivery
"""
)

T_LHDelivery.createOrReplaceTempView("T_LHDelivery")
## Print successful message on the Production Script
